lst.name: sentence
lst.str: CBT chairman Karsten Mahlmann said in a statement the delay will "afford all firms the time necessary to be 100 pct ready for this innovative program, we are postponing the opening date."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The evening session will make available to traders in the Far East interest rate hedging vehicles when their day is just beginning, and the CBT hopes to attract trading capital from the Pacific Rim's burgeoning financial centers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The board of directors accepted yesterday's recommendation by a committee of members overseeing the planned evening session, which was originally scheduled to start April 2.
